channel.title: Zanaris - The first Ps-Inception remake
channel.description:
We have only been open for a couple months and we already got a nice community built up. We strive to bring you a lag-free and fun gaming environment.
[b]With main features:[/b]
-PVP system with Earned Potential -Target system -Ancient artefacts -Dungeneering items -Champion Tokens minigame -PVP Armour/Primal/Chaotics -Avatars/Tormented demons/Frost dragons/Ballak the pummeler/Bork/Corp Beast/Zanaris Island -Curses -New maps -Castle Wars -Double XP Weekends -Worldwide skilling -Monster hunting -Achievements -Clan chats -Beginner train areas -Safe PK Area -PK Points -Full godwars -Friendly community
[b]Client features[/b] We have adjusted our Client to make it suitable for everybody. Everybody wants to have a choice in old features such as the old hp bar or the regular hits, and there are people that prefer the new RS ones. This is all possible. Ability to: -Choose the HP bar or the old one -Choose the new RS F keys (to switch) or hold the old ones -Choose x10 damage ingame or the regular hits -Choose the new hitmarks (melee, range, mage) or hold the original 07 RS ones
Visit us at: [url=http://www.zanaris.net]http://www.zanaris.net[/url]
Play the Server here: [url=http://www.zanaris.net/forum/showthread.php?t=57]http://www.zanaris.net/forum/showthread.php?t=57[/url]
Webclient: [url=http://www.zanaris.net/play]http://www.zanaris.net/play[/url]

item.title: Zanaris - The first Ps-Inception remake
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:11, topic:551519”][quote author=Welliton_inc link=topic=670434.msg4487207#msg4487207 date=1434915025]
I’m pretty sure this server has a certificate. And the reason I said what I said was because of the fact that there are only a handful (possibly 10 servers altogether) which have payed the hefty sum of money to get the certificate. Before the Java update, most of the players accessed a server through a webclient rather than a downloadable client since some people would have rather not downloaded the jar. Therefore as simple as it may be, it is still a feature which will gain many players from it.
[/quote]
Maybe before the update… sure.
But everyone now basically ignores the webclient feature because 9/10 don’t work without whitelisting.
Also: There are sites that offer Java certs for free. No need to shell out money.[/quote]

Yeah that is true. Most of the servers that even advertise having a webclient isn’t even functional. Possibly due to not updating their advertisement thread.

Also I was not aware you could get it for free, I’ll look into that

Read full topic

item.title: Zanaris - The first Ps-Inception remake
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Welliton_inc:

I’m pretty sure this server has a certificate. And the reason I said what I said was because of the fact that there are only a handful (possibly 10 servers altogether) which have payed the hefty sum of money to get the certificate. Before the Java update, most of the players accessed a server through a webclient rather than a downloadable client since some people would have rather not downloaded the jar. Therefore as simple as it may be, it is still a feature which will gain many players from it.

Maybe before the update… sure.
But everyone now basically ignores the webclient feature because 9/10 don’t work without whitelisting.
Also: There are sites that offer Java certs for free. No need to shell out money.

Read full topic

item.title: Zanaris - The first Ps-Inception remake
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:551519”][quote author=Welliton_inc link=topic=670434.msg4483125#msg4483125 date=1431692661]
The server looks alright, if I were you i’d put the media in a spoiler, makes the thread look much more cleaner.

Also the fact you have a webclient alone means you will reach playerbases many other servers may not be able to achieve. Goodluck with this.
[/quote]
The fact that you judge a server based on their ability to add a .jar onto an html page surprises me…

Especially since Java 1.7 basically made all webclients useless… Lol.
No one can use it without whitelisting the website, because the webclient was self signed. Also, lets not mention the fact that the webclient is loading underneath the nav bar: http://puu.sh/ixufM/874d3e860f.png
But by all means, that will generate a huge playerbase.

I’ll check out the server itself and give a review on how I like it…
But webclients are useless without a signing certificate.[/quote]

I’m pretty sure this server has a certificate. And the reason I said what I said was because of the fact that there are only a handful (possibly 10 servers altogether) which have payed the hefty sum of money to get the certificate. Before the Java update, most of the players accessed a server through a webclient rather than a downloadable client since some people would have rather not downloaded the jar. Therefore as simple as it may be, it is still a feature which will gain many players from it.

Read full topic

item.title: Zanaris - The first Ps-Inception remake

item.title: Zanaris - The first Ps-Inception remake
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:3, topic:551519”]The server looks alright, if I were you i’d put the media in a spoiler, makes the thread look much more cleaner.

Also the fact you have a webclient alone means you will reach playerbases many other servers may not be able to achieve. Goodluck with this.[/quote]
The fact that you judge a server based on their ability to add a .jar onto an html page surprises me…

Especially since Java 1.7 basically made all webclients useless… Lol.
No one can use it without whitelisting the website, because the webclient was self signed. Also, lets not mention the fact that the webclient is loading underneath the nav bar: http://puu.sh/ixufM/874d3e860f.png
But by all means, that will generate a huge playerbase.

I’ll check out the server itself and give a review on how I like it…
But webclients are useless without a signing certificate.

Read full topic

item.title: Zanaris - The first Ps-Inception remake
item.dc:creator: @Zanaris_Kevin Zanaris Kevin
item.description:
@Zanaris_Kevin wrote:

We have only been open for a couple months and we already got a nice community built up. We strive to bring you a lag-free and fun gaming environment.

With main features:

-PVP system with Earned Potential
-Target system
-Ancient artefacts
-Dungeneering items
-Champion Tokens minigame
-PVP Armour/Primal/Chaotics
-Avatars/Tormented demons/Frost dragons/Ballak the pummeler/Bork/Corp Beast/Zanaris Island
-Curses
-New maps
-Castle Wars
-Double XP Weekends
-Worldwide skilling
-Monster hunting
-Achievements
-Clan chats
-Beginner train areas
-Safe PK Area
-PK Points
-Full godwars
-Friendly community

Client features
We have adjusted our Client to make it suitable for everybody. Everybody wants to have a choice in old features such as the old hp bar or the regular hits, and there are people that prefer the new RS ones. This is all possible.
Ability to:
-Choose the HP bar or the old one
-Choose the new RS F keys (to switch) or hold the old ones
-Choose x10 damage ingame or the regular hits
-Choose the new hitmarks (melee, range, mage) or hold the original 07 RS ones

Visit us at:
http://www.zanaris.net

Play the Server here:
http://www.zanaris.net/forum/showthread.php?t=57

Webclient:
http://www.zanaris.net/play
